definition: of or relating to antibiotic drugs, a chemical substance derivable from a mold or bacterium that can kill microorganisms and cure bacterial infections
details:
adjective
- of or relating to antibiotic drugs
noun
- a chemical substance derivable from a mold or bacterium that can kill microorganisms and cure bacterial infections
= example: a chemical substance derivable from a mold or bacterium that can kill microorganisms and cure bacterial infections
= synonyms: antibiotic drug
